description:
All your chats in one app. Yes, really.

A single app to chat on iMessage, WhatsApp, and 13 other chat networks. You can search, snooze, or archive messages. And with a unified inbox, you’ll never miss a message again.
New
Disappearing Messages indicators show on messages and in the chat’s header
Create New Groups on Matrix with CMD+SHIFT+N / CTRL+SHIFT+N
On-Device Instagram: Added support for receiving typing indicators for other users
Turn spell checking on or off under Settings > Appearance > Composer > Enable spellcheck
Fixed & Improved
Fixed an issue that caused On-Device Twitter connections to be disconnected
Fixed chats sometimes not staying in Low Priority or Pinned
Fixed “Disable emoji autocomplete” setting
Fixed some instances of profile picture not syncing
Fixed auto-linking of email addresses in messages
Fixed message forwarding not working for messages with attachments
Fixed instances of chats opening at the wrong scroll position
Fixed an issue with On-Device Instagram and Facebook bridges where incoming messages could be missed
Fixed messages failing to send with a "bridge is not started" error after logging out of one of several accounts on the same On-Device connection
Fixed a crash that can occur when logging out
Ensure quick reactions honor your chosen skin tone
Ensured link previews are sent with scheduled messages
Prevent iMessage search results showing when you’ve filtered to a different account
Addressed high CPU usage in certain bridges
Several other small UI/UX improvements
September 16, 2025 - Beeper Android - 4.32.1
